title: League of Legends only launches after Reinstallation
body: After trying to open the client and launching the game, the LoL client process is still in the task manager and does not launch anymore for some reason. I have tried reinstalling it thrice, I have tried adding -no-sandbox to the shortcut, deleting files in the projects and releases folder, opening in with administrative properties. What would happen is I would reinstall, it would be fine and then I would restart my computer and this problem will arise again. I don't want to keep reinstalling league of legends just to play it.

replies.body: It's not my connection because my roommate uses the same wifi access point as me and is still able to run league. I allowed League through my firewall and turned off UAC controls. Mouse has a loading circle and then nothing else but 2 processes in the task manager relating to lol.

It sounds like this could be caused by a number of different culprits. The first thing I'd check would be your local network settings, which you can compare to our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to figure out if your settings are aligned with what we recommend for League.

Please let me know if you run into any more issues when trying to launch the game after working through those steps.
